name: .EPK
summary: Learn about .EPK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

instructions: You can decompile assets.epk and other asset-containing EPK files using ayunWebEPK (Web), to view the assets they contain.
To load an EPK file that contains an Eaglercraft world backup:
Open the single-player version of Eaglercraft.
Navigate to and select your EPK file.
Name your world and select Continue.
The world your EPK file contains will appear in the Select World menu.
